name: Cthulhu VS Kitten
description:
You need to defeate eldritch monsters with throwing cats in their face.

Controlls: 

Move = WASD

Sprint = Shift

Jump = Space

Shoot= Left Mouse

Menu = Esc

Team: PraiseTheSun

Size: 2

BuildingTime: ~20h/per Person

Credits:

Background Musik: https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/platformer2/

Menu: "Game Jam Menu Template" by Unity Technologies

PlayerController:  Standart Assets FirstPersonCharacter by Unity Technologies
